page.title: 17Shops
page.content: In the area there is a general store with Post Office in Ickham and several shops in L'bourne. The butcher sells English meat and home made sausages, the Corn Stores - grocery ,drinks and animal feeds and the grocer in the High Street also has the Post Office. There is a greengrocer, newsagent selling toys, cards, sweets and tobacco, a craft shop, a shop selling haberdashery, wool and school uniforms and a hairdresser. The two antique shops, one deals in brass and silver and the other in furniture and garden ornaments. There are three garages for car service and two sell petrol. There is a tea room open in the summer months in W'breux and the Bow Window Hotel and Restaurant in L'bourne serves meals all the year round. The Heelaway Kennels breeds, trains and sells alsation dogs.
